Package io.hstream

Interface HStreamClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    public interface HStreamClient
extends AutoCloseable
    A client for the HStreamDB.

      • createStream

        void createStream​(String stream,
                  short replicationFactor,
                  int shardCount,
                  int backlogDuration)
        Create a new stream.
        Parameters:
        stream - the name of the stream
        replicationFactor - replication factor of the stream
        shardCount - number of shards in the stream
        backlogDuration - backlog duration(in seconds) of the stream

        Create a new stream.
        Parameters:
